Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Italian Ministry of the Economy, Italy Consultant on Public Finance and Empirical Methodologies for the National Technical Commission of Public Finance
World Bank, USA: Consultant, Economic Policy & Debt Department (PRMED)

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Italian Association of Law and Economics Annual Meeting, Milan; Changes, Rules, and Institutions. Law and Economics in the context of Development. School of Oriental and African Studies (SOAS), London; International Society of New Institutional Economics Annual Meeting (ISNIE), Reykjavik; Société Québécoise de Science Politique Annual Workshop, Québec city; Searching for New Models in the Economic Analysis of Law (Taormina).

University of Pompeu Fabra; University of Rome La Sapienza; University of Rome III; Italian Association of Law and Economics Annual Meeting, Bologna; Italian Association of Public Economics Annual Meeting, Pavia; Inside the Black Box of the Courts’ Decision-Making Process: Theory and Empirical Evidence, Catania.

Italian Association of Law and Economics Annual Meeting, Bolzano; Italian Society of Economists Annual Meeting, Catania; Italian Society of Health Economics Annual Meeting, Turin; PEARLE Workshop, Turin; European Public Choice Society Annual Meeting, Izmir.

Uppsala University; University of Turin; Italian Society of Economists Annual Meeting, Rome; Italian Association of Public Economics Annual Meeting, Pavia; European Association of Law and Economics Annual Meeting, Rome; Monitoring Italy 2009. Measuring the Progress of Italian Society. Institutes for Studies and Economic Analyses (ISAE) and OECD, Rome.

Spanish Association of Law and Economics, Barcelona; Rotterdam Workshop of Political Economy, Rotterdam; European Association of Law and Economics, Hamburg; Conference of Empirical Legal Studies, Chicago; Bank of Italy Workshop, Rome; Cesifo Workshop on Political Economy, Dresden; Annual Meeting Italian Association of Law and Economics, Turin.

University of Pompeu Fabra; Spanish Law and Economics Association Annual meeting, Valencia; European Law and Economics Association Annual meeting, Stockholm; Italian Association of Health Economics Annual meeting; European Commission; Italian Association of Law and Economics Annual meeting

Bocconi University; University of Bolzen; Copenhagen Business School; European Public Choice Annual meeting, Zurich; American Law and Economics Annual Meeting, Nashville; Universita’ della Svizzera Italiana, Lugano; ESPA Annual meeting, Barcelona; ISNIE Annual meeting, Florence; Spanish Law and Economics Annual Conference, Granada; APSA Annual meeting, Chicago; Conference of Empirical Legal Studies, Philadelphia
Organizzazione Law and Economics Seminars (Copenhagen Business School)

Lund University seminar; DWI seminar, Berlin; Copenhagen University seminar; American Law and Economics Annual Meeting, Chicago; Spanish Association of Law and Economics; Italian Association of Law and Economics

University of Turin seminar; University of Southern Denmark seminar; Copenhagen Business School seminar; University of Economics of Prague seminar; Spanish Association of Health Economics; Cambridge Workshop on Spatial Health Economics; Italian Association of Public Economics; Workshop on Health Economics, University of Copenhagen; NHH, Bergen seminar.
ZEW Mannheim seminario; American Law and Economics Association Annual Meeting, Harvard; European Association of Law and Economics, Bologna; Italian Economists Annual Meeting, Bocconi
Organizzazione Workshop of Law and Economics of Health Care, Prague
Area organizer: Session Health Law; Health Insurance; Medical Malpractice, at the European Association of Law and Economics Annual Meeting, Bologna University.

European Grant for Young Researcher, XXI World Conference of International Vereinigung für Rechts- und Sozialphilosophie, Lund
Grant 3,000 euro per la pubblicazione del libro Target centrali e finanza locale. Il caso degli asili nido in Italia (joint with M. A. Antonelli).  Finanziamento dell'università' Cattolica di milano

ECFIN2012 010/C for the paper “Assessing Types of Fiscal Rules” (with E. Galli) presented in the Workshop: Fiscal relations across government’s levels in times of crisis – making compatible fiscal decentralisation and budgetary discipline (November 2012) (6,000 euro)
Copenhagen Business School Research Allowance for Special Research Effort in 2015, 20,000DKK (approx. 2,684 euro)
